name: Bà Shì Kuáng Dāo
summary:
“Ba Shi Kuang Dao launches today with thunderous momentum!
This is a groundbreaking legendary masterpiece that overturns tradition and reignites passion—no tricks, no hidden traps, only the pure thrill of PK combat! Amid flashing blades and clashing steel, who will rise to claim the peak? Log in now and begin your conquest in Ba Shi Kuang Dao!

name: Bàito
summary: Are you looking for a fun couch game up to 8 Players? Challenge your friends to reach the final score! Vote each round for your favorite modifier! Endless possible maps and combinations! Use your creativity to defeat your opponents and climb the leaderboard! Get ready and "Fai del Bàito"!
